name: 747 Landing Simulator
overview: 747 Landing Simulator (released in Germany under the names 747 Flug-Simulator as well as747 Lande Simulator) is a game that realistically simulates the airport runway approach and landing of a jet airliner, with you, as the pilot, responsible for landing your aircraft safely. You view the runway approach from the cockpit, with the instrument panel displaying on the lower third of your screen. The display is perspective correct and instruments show real time simulated conditions. This program and many others were published by the Atari Program Exchange (APX), a publisher that specialized in distributing user-created games and applications.
